dict.acceptation: 品脱；一品脱的量器或容器；一品脱容器的东西；

sent.orig: That pint-sized, phony Flutemaster and his annoying friends are back on the Pirate Ship.
sent.trans: 那个小骗子魔笛手，还有他那些讨厌的朋友们又回到了海盗船。

sent.orig: I'd like a pint of foam!
Montano. Good faith, a little one; not past a pint, as I am a soldier.
sent.trans: 蒙太诺真的，只是小小的一杯，顶多也不过一品脱的份量；我是一个军人，从来不会说谎的。

sent.orig: Henry lingered on and on, and even treated himself to a third half-pint.
sent.trans: 亨利逗留不去，甚至喝上了第三杯。

sent.orig: European arum resembling the cuckoo pint.
sent.trans: 类似于天南星的欧洲海芋植物。
